name: transport, freight, sea, container ship with reefer, freezing | transport, freight, sea, container ship with reefer, freezing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13658/documentation

This dataset represent transport of reefer (refrigerated container) on a transoceanic ship. The operation mode of the reefer is freezing (temperature between -35°C and -18°C).;The amount of operation of the reefer needed is calculated using the assumption of the average speed of the transoceanic ship.;Transoceanic ship carying reefers (http://www.hellenicshippingnews.com/cma-cgm-is-launching-the-citrus-express-service-for-seasonal-exportation-of-fruits-between-east-med-and-black-sea/, accessed 20141216).

This dataset simply combine two other activities - transport, freight, sea, transoceanic ship and operation of reefer, For more information on these two activities please see the datasets representing these two activities.
category: H:Transportation and storage/50:Water transport/501:Sea and coastal water transport/5012:Sea and coastal freight water transport
